matches.explanation: Partial match: Red Team's 'Allows public read access to sensitive transaction logs' on transaction_logs was partially detected as 'Public Read Access Enabled on Sensitive S3 Bucket' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_logs

Partial match: Red Team's 'Allows unrestricted network access to Lambda function' on lambda_network was partially detected as 'Overly Permissive Security Group Ingress' on aws_security_group.lambda_network
Missed: Red Team's 'No encryption for sensitive financial data storage' on transaction_storage was not detected
Partial match: Red Team's 'No logging configuration for audit trail' on transaction_audit was partially detected as 'Missing S3 Access Logging' on aws_s3_bucket.transaction_audit
Missed: Red Team's 'Database not encrypted at rest' on transaction_db was not detected
